name: Apsara Restaurant
address: 13 Queen's Park E Cadiz Rd, Port of Spain

reviews.comments: Pricey for the food served.. There are better options out there
Service was on point. Food was exceptional. Ambience and setting was of that real authentic Indian feel and free valet parking
Came here with some foreign friends over Carnival and they stayed open late for us Carnival Tuesday! Thanks guys! Great food, great service a definite recommend
Good Italian in downtown Port of Spain.  Wine was off and they took it off the bill - the right move.  Good atmosphere.
This place is one of the few places were are treated a lot much more better than average. The food is good and being in downtown it has a place to park
The Best restaurants in my opinion, Italian food the best choice at Buzo...
Great ambiance, excellent food. The Carpaccio di Manzo was delicious and the Porccini Ravioli was fantastic

Amazing experience had the privilege to work under Mr. Angelo Caffone while he was the Executive Chef of Ilcolosseo. Great person, Staff is very professional and efficient. Food is awesome as expected.
Angelo himself is an amazing guy; calm, funny, outspoken, down to earth and honest. The food is also amazing; consistent, always delicious, italian yet local. Excellent.

name: Jaffa at the Oval
address: Level 2 Pavilion, 98 Tragarete Rd, Port of Spain

reviews.comments: The food was great and they had it all! Great service and good ambience. Would definitely recommend.
Had my birthday get together there. Food was excellent atmosphere great. Will return again.
Decent food with a great location.

One of the many restaurants in Trinidad that you have to try. Mixed arabic-continental type of food; either you love it or hate it, there's no in between. Service is always good, can be a little slow but I guess that adds to you relaxing and removing some of that daily bustle.

One of Trinidad's best restaurants.  The food is excellent and the Chef occasionally visit the tables ensuring the customers are enjoying their dining experience.  The servers provide some of the best service I've ever had in a restaurant.  I would highly recommend this restaurant.

One of my favourite ( if not my favourite) restaurants in Trinidad! I go often with my little girls during the day, service is excellent... Food is always fresh, best salads I have had in Trinidad and it is the most peaceful relaxing restaurant with a wonderful atmosphere! A hidden gem, an oasis in a busy city! Just fabulous!
